00072 int cl_object_header_init(struct cl_object_header *h)
00073 {
00074         int result;
00075 
00076         ENTRY;
00077         result = lu_object_header_init(&h->coh_lu);
00078         if (result == 0) {
00079                 spin_lock_init(&h->coh_attr_guard);
00080                 lockdep_set_class(&h->coh_attr_guard, &cl_attr_guard_class);
00081                 h->coh_page_bufsize = 0;
00082         }
00083         RETURN(result);
00084 }
00085 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_header_init);
00086 
00090 void cl_object_header_fini(struct cl_object_header *h)
00091 {
00092         lu_object_header_fini(&h->coh_lu);
00093 }

00103 struct cl_object *cl_object_find(const struct lu_env *env,
00104                                  struct cl_device *cd, const struct lu_fid *fid,
00105                                  const struct cl_object_conf *c)
00106 {
00107         might_sleep();
00108         return lu2cl(lu_object_find_slice(env, cl2lu_dev(cd), fid, &c->coc_lu));
00109 }
00110 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_find);
00111 
00120 void cl_object_put(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *o)
00121 {
00122         lu_object_put(env, &o->co_lu);
00123 }
00124 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_put);
00125 
00134 void cl_object_get(struct cl_object *o)
00135 {
00136         lu_object_get(&o->co_lu);
00137 }
00138 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_get);
00139 
00145 struct cl_object *cl_object_top(struct cl_object *o)
00146 {
00147         struct cl_object_header *hdr = cl_object_header(o);
00148         struct cl_object *top;
00149 
00150         while (hdr->coh_parent != NULL)
00151                 hdr = hdr->coh_parent;
00152 
00153         top = lu2cl(lu_object_top(&hdr->coh_lu));
00154         CDEBUG(D_TRACE, "%p -> %p\n", o, top);
00155         return top;
00156 }
00157 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_top);
00158 
00168 static spinlock_t *cl_object_attr_guard(struct cl_object *o)
00169 {
00170         return &cl_object_header(cl_object_top(o))->coh_attr_guard;
00171 }
00172 
00180 void cl_object_attr_lock(struct cl_object *o)
00181 __acquires(cl_object_attr_guard(o))
00182 {
00183         spin_lock(cl_object_attr_guard(o));
00184 }
00185 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_attr_lock);
00186 
00190 void cl_object_attr_unlock(struct cl_object *o)
00191 __releases(cl_object_attr_guard(o))
00192 {
00193         spin_unlock(cl_object_attr_guard(o));
00194 }
00195 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_attr_unlock);
00196 
00204 int cl_object_attr_get(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
00205                         struct cl_attr *attr)
00206 {
00207         struct lu_object_header *top;
00208         int result;
00209 
00210         assert_spin_locked(cl_object_attr_guard(obj));
00211         ENTRY;
00212 
00213         top = obj->co_lu.lo_header;
00214         result = 0;
00215         list_for_each_entry(obj, &top->loh_layers, co_lu.lo_linkage) {
00216                 if (obj->co_ops->coo_attr_get != NULL) {
00217                         result = obj->co_ops->coo_attr_get(env, obj, attr);
00218                         if (result != 0) {
00219                                 if (result > 0)
00220                                         result = 0;
00221                                 break;
00222                         }
00223                 }
00224         }
00225         RETURN(result);
00226 }
00227 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_attr_get);
00228 
00236 int cl_object_attr_update(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
00237                           const struct cl_attr *attr, unsigned v)
00238 {
00239         struct lu_object_header *top;
00240         int result;
00241 
00242         assert_spin_locked(cl_object_attr_guard(obj));
00243         ENTRY;
00244 
00245         top = obj->co_lu.lo_header;
00246         result = 0;
00247         list_for_each_entry_reverse(obj, &top->loh_layers, co_lu.lo_linkage) {
00248                 if (obj->co_ops->coo_attr_update != NULL) {
00249                         result = obj->co_ops->coo_attr_update(env, obj, attr,
00250                                                               v);
00251                         if (result != 0) {
00252                                 if (result > 0)
00253                                         result = 0;
00254                                 break;
00255                         }
00256                 }
00257         }
00258         RETURN(result);
00259 }
00260 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_attr_update);
00261 
00270 int cl_object_glimpse(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
00271                       struct ost_lvb *lvb)
00272 {
00273         struct lu_object_header *top;
00274         int result;
00275 
00276         ENTRY;
00277         top = obj->co_lu.lo_header;
00278         result = 0;
00279         list_for_each_entry_reverse(obj, &top->loh_layers, co_lu.lo_linkage) {
00280                 if (obj->co_ops->coo_glimpse != NULL) {
00281                         result = obj->co_ops->coo_glimpse(env, obj, lvb);
00282                         if (result != 0)
00283                                 break;
00284                 }
00285         }
00286         LU_OBJECT_HEADER(D_DLMTRACE, env, lu_object_top(top),
00287                          "size: "LPU64" mtime: "LPU64" atime: "LPU64" "
00288                          "ctime: "LPU64" blocks: "LPU64"\n",
00289                          lvb->lvb_size, lvb->lvb_mtime, lvb->lvb_atime,
00290                          lvb->lvb_ctime, lvb->lvb_blocks);
00291         RETURN(result);
00292 }
00293 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_glimpse);

00298 int cl_conf_set(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
00299                 const struct cl_object_conf *conf)
00300 {
00301         struct lu_object_header *top;
00302         int result;
00303 
00304         ENTRY;
00305         top = obj->co_lu.lo_header;
00306         result = 0;
00307         list_for_each_entry(obj, &top->loh_layers, co_lu.lo_linkage) {
00308                 if (obj->co_ops->coo_conf_set != NULL) {
00309                         result = obj->co_ops->coo_conf_set(env, obj, conf);
00310                         if (result != 0)
00311                                 break;
00312                 }
00313         }
00314         RETURN(result);
00315 }
00316 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_conf_set);

00321 int cl_object_prune(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj)
00322 {
00323         struct lu_object_header *top;
00324         struct cl_object *o;
00325         int result;
00326         ENTRY;
00327 
00328         top = obj->co_lu.lo_header;
00329         result = 0;
00330         list_for_each_entry(o, &top->loh_layers, co_lu.lo_linkage) {
00331                 if (o->co_ops->coo_prune != NULL) {
00332                         result = o->co_ops->coo_prune(env, o);
00333                         if (result != 0)
00334                                 break;
00335                 }
00336         }
00337 
00338         RETURN(result);
00339 }
00340 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_prune);

00348         struct lu_object_header *top;
00349         int                     result = 0;
00350         ENTRY;
00351 
00352         top = obj->co_lu.lo_header;
00353         list_for_each_entry(obj, &top->loh_layers, co_lu.lo_linkage) {
00354                 if (obj->co_ops->coo_getstripe != NULL) {
00355                         result = obj->co_ops->coo_getstripe(env, obj, uarg);
00356                         if (result != 0)
00357                                 break;
00358                 }
00359         }
00360         RETURN(result);
00361 }
00362 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_getstripe);

00376 int cl_object_fiemap(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
00377                      struct ll_fiemap_info_key *key,
00378                      struct fiemap *fiemap, size_t *buflen)
00379 {
00380         struct lu_object_header *top;
00381         int                     result = 0;
00382         ENTRY;
00383 
00384         top = obj->co_lu.lo_header;
00385         list_for_each_entry(obj, &top->loh_layers, co_lu.lo_linkage) {
00386                 if (obj->co_ops->coo_fiemap != NULL) {
00387                         result = obj->co_ops->coo_fiemap(env, obj, key, fiemap,
00388                                                          buflen);
00389                         if (result != 0)
00390                                 break;
00391                 }
00392         }
00393         RETURN(result);
00394 }

00396 
00397 int cl_object_layout_get(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
00398                          struct cl_layout *cl)
00399 {
00400         struct lu_object_header *top = obj->co_lu.lo_header;
00401         ENTRY;
00402 
00403         list_for_each_entry(obj, &top->loh_layers, co_lu.lo_linkage) {
00404                 if (obj->co_ops->coo_layout_get != NULL)
00405                         return obj->co_ops->coo_layout_get(env, obj, cl);
00406         }
00407 
00408         RETURN(-EOPNOTSUPP);
00409 }
00410 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_layout_get);
00411 
00412 loff_t cl_object_maxbytes(struct cl_object *obj)
00413 {
00414         struct lu_object_header *top = obj->co_lu.lo_header;
00415         loff_t maxbytes = LLONG_MAX;
00416         ENTRY;
00417 
00418         list_for_each_entry(obj, &top->loh_layers, co_lu.lo_linkage) {
00419                 if (obj->co_ops->coo_maxbytes != NULL)
00420                         maxbytes = min_t(loff_t, obj->co_ops->coo_maxbytes(obj),
00421                                          maxbytes);
00422         }
00423 
00424         RETURN(maxbytes);
00425 }
00426 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_maxbytes);
00427 
00435 void cl_object_kill(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj)
00436 {
00437         struct cl_object_header *hdr = cl_object_header(obj);
00438 
00439         set_bit(LU_OBJECT_HEARD_BANSHEE, &hdr->coh_lu.loh_flags);
00440 }
00441 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_object_kill);
00442 
00443 void cache_stats_init(struct cache_stats *cs, const char *name)
00444 {
00445         int i;
00446 
00447         cs->cs_name = name;
00448         for (i = 0; i < CS_NR; i++)
00449                 atomic_set(&cs->cs_stats[i], 0);
00450 }
00451 
00452 static int cache_stats_print(const struct cache_stats *cs,
00453                              struct seq_file *m, int h)
00454 {
00455         int i;
00456 
00457         /*
00458          *   lookup    hit    total  cached create
00459          * env: ...... ...... ...... ...... ......
00460          */
00461         if (h) {
00462                 const char *names[CS_NR] = CS_NAMES;
00463 
00464                 seq_printf(m, "%6s", " ");
00465                 for (i = 0; i < CS_NR; i++)
00466                         seq_printf(m, "%8s", names[i]);
00467                 seq_printf(m, "\n");
00468         }
00469 
00470         seq_printf(m, "%5.5s:", cs->cs_name);
00471         for (i = 0; i < CS_NR; i++)
00472                 seq_printf(m, "%8u", atomic_read(&cs->cs_stats[i]));
00473         return 0;
00474 }
00475 
00476 static void cl_env_percpu_refill(void);
00477 
00484 int cl_site_init(struct cl_site *s, struct cl_device *d)
00485 {
00486         size_t i;
00487         int result;
00488 
00489         result = lu_site_init(&s->cs_lu, &d->cd_lu_dev);
00490         if (result == 0) {
00491                 cache_stats_init(&s->cs_pages, "pages");
00492                 for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(s->cs_pages_state); ++i)
00493                         atomic_set(&s->cs_pages_state[0], 0);
00494                 cl_env_percpu_refill();
00495         }
00496         return result;
00497 }
00498 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_site_init);
00499 
00503 void cl_site_fini(struct cl_site *s)
00504 {
00505         lu_site_fini(&s->cs_lu);
00506 }
00507 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_site_fini);
00508 
00509 static struct cache_stats cl_env_stats = {
00510         .cs_name    = "envs",
00511         .cs_stats = { ATOMIC_INIT(0), }
00512 };
00513 
00518 int cl_site_stats_print(const struct cl_site *site, struct seq_file *m)
00519 {
00520         static const char *pstate[] = {
00521                 [CPS_CACHED]    = "c",
00522                 [CPS_OWNED]     = "o",
00523                 [CPS_PAGEOUT]   = "w",
00524                 [CPS_PAGEIN]    = "r",
00525                 [CPS_FREEING]   = "f"
00526         };
00527         size_t i;
00528 
00529 /*
00530        lookup    hit  total   busy create
00531 pages: ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... [...... ...... ...... ......]
00532 locks: ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... [...... ...... ...... ...... ......]
00533   env: ...... ...... ...... ...... ......
00534  */
00535         lu_site_stats_seq_print(&site->cs_lu, m);
00536         cache_stats_print(&site->cs_pages, m, 1);
00537         seq_printf(m, " [");
00538         for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(site->cs_pages_state); ++i)
00539                 seq_printf(m, "%s: %u ", pstate[i],
00540                            atomic_read(&site->cs_pages_state[i]));
00541         seq_printf(m, "]\n");
00542         cache_stats_print(&cl_env_stats, m, 0);
00543         seq_printf(m, "\n");
00544         return 0;
00545 }
00546 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_site_stats_print);

00548 /*****************************************************************************
00549  *
00550  * lu_env handling on client.
00551  *
00552  */
00553 
00572 static struct list_head cl_envs;
00573 static unsigned cl_envs_cached_nr  = 0;
00574 static unsigned cl_envs_cached_max = 128; /* XXX: prototype: arbitrary limit
00575                                            * for now. */
00576 static DEFINE_SPINLOCK(cl_envs_guard);
00577 
00578 struct cl_env {
00579         void             *ce_magic;
00580         struct lu_env     ce_lu;
00581         struct lu_context ce_ses;
00582 
00583 #ifdef LL_TASK_CL_ENV
00584         void             *ce_prev;
00585 #else
00586 
00590         struct hlist_node  ce_node;
00591 #endif
00592 
00603         void             *ce_owner;
00604 
00605         /*
00606          * Linkage into global list of all client environments. Used for
00607          * garbage collection.
00608          */
00609         struct list_head  ce_linkage;
00610         /*
00611          *
00612          */
00613         int               ce_ref;
00614         /*
00615          * Debugging field: address of the caller who made original
00616          * allocation.
00617          */
00618         void             *ce_debug;
00619 };
00620 
00621 #ifdef CONFIG_DEBUG_PAGESTATE_TRACKING
00622 #define CL_ENV_INC(counter) atomic_inc(&cl_env_stats.cs_stats[CS_##counter])
00623 
00624 #define CL_ENV_DEC(counter) do {                                              \
00625         LASSERT(atomic_read(&cl_env_stats.cs_stats[CS_##counter]) > 0);   \
00626         atomic_dec(&cl_env_stats.cs_stats[CS_##counter]);                 \
00627 } while (0)
00628 #else
00629 #define CL_ENV_INC(counter)
00630 #define CL_ENV_DEC(counter)
00631 #endif
00632 
00633 static void cl_env_init0(struct cl_env *cle, void *debug)
00634 {
00635         LASSERT(cle->ce_ref == 0);
00636         LASSERT(cle->ce_magic == &cl_env_init0);
00637         LASSERT(cle->ce_debug == NULL && cle->ce_owner == NULL);
00638 
00639         cle->ce_ref = 1;
00640         cle->ce_debug = debug;
00641         CL_ENV_INC(busy);
00642 }
00643 
00644 
00645 #ifndef LL_TASK_CL_ENV
00646 /*
00647  * The implementation of using hash table to connect cl_env and thread
00648  */
00649 
00650 static struct cfs_hash *cl_env_hash;
00651 
00652 static unsigned cl_env_hops_hash(struct cfs_hash *lh,
00653                                  const void *key, unsigned mask)
00654 {
00655 #if BITS_PER_LONG == 64
00656         return cfs_hash_u64_hash((__u64)key, mask);
00657 #else
00658         return cfs_hash_u32_hash((__u32)key, mask);
00659 #endif
00660 }
00661 
00662 static void *cl_env_hops_obj(struct hlist_node *hn)
00663 {
00664         struct cl_env *cle = hlist_entry(hn, struct cl_env, ce_node);
00665 
00666         LASSERT(cle->ce_magic == &cl_env_init0);
00667         return (void *)cle;
00668 }
00669 
00670 static int cl_env_hops_keycmp(const void *key, struct hlist_node *hn)
00671 {
00672         struct cl_env *cle = cl_env_hops_obj(hn);
00673 
00674         LASSERT(cle->ce_owner != NULL);
00675         return (key == cle->ce_owner);
00676 }
00677 
00678 static void cl_env_hops_noop(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hn)
00679 {
00680         struct cl_env *cle = hlist_entry(hn, struct cl_env, ce_node);
00681         LASSERT(cle->ce_magic == &cl_env_init0);
00682 }
00683 
00684 static struct cfs_hash_ops cl_env_hops = {
00685         .hs_hash        = cl_env_hops_hash,
00686         .hs_key         = cl_env_hops_obj,
00687         .hs_keycmp      = cl_env_hops_keycmp,
00688         .hs_object      = cl_env_hops_obj,
00689         .hs_get         = cl_env_hops_noop,
00690         .hs_put_locked  = cl_env_hops_noop,
00691 };
00692 
00693 static inline struct cl_env *cl_env_fetch(void)
00694 {
00695         struct cl_env *cle;
00696 
00697         cle = cfs_hash_lookup(cl_env_hash, (void *) (long) current->pid);
00698         LASSERT(ergo(cle, cle->ce_magic == &cl_env_init0));
00699         return cle;
00700 }
00701 
00702 static inline void cl_env_attach(struct cl_env *cle)
00703 {
00704         if (cle) {
00705                 int rc;
00706 
00707                 LASSERT(cle->ce_owner == NULL);
00708                 cle->ce_owner = (void *) (long) current->pid;
00709                 rc = cfs_hash_add_unique(cl_env_hash, cle->ce_owner,
00710                                          &cle->ce_node);
00711                 LASSERT(rc == 0);
00712         }
00713 }
00714 
00715 static inline void cl_env_do_detach(struct cl_env *cle)
00716 {
00717         void *cookie;
00718 
00719         LASSERT(cle->ce_owner == (void *) (long) current->pid);
00720         cookie = cfs_hash_del(cl_env_hash, cle->ce_owner,
00721                               &cle->ce_node);
00722         LASSERT(cookie == cle);
00723         cle->ce_owner = NULL;
00724 }
00725 
00726 static int cl_env_store_init(void) {
00727         cl_env_hash = cfs_hash_create("cl_env",
00728                                       HASH_CL_ENV_BITS, HASH_CL_ENV_BITS,
00729                                       HASH_CL_ENV_BKT_BITS, 0,
00730                                       CFS_HASH_MIN_THETA,
00731                                       CFS_HASH_MAX_THETA,
00732                                       &cl_env_hops,
00733                                       CFS_HASH_RW_BKTLOCK);
00734         return cl_env_hash != NULL ? 0 :-ENOMEM;
00735 }
00736 
00737 static void cl_env_store_fini(void) {
00738         cfs_hash_putref(cl_env_hash);
00739 }
00740 
00741 #else /* LL_TASK_CL_ENV */
00742 /*
00743  * The implementation of store cl_env directly in thread structure.
00744  */
00745 
00746 static inline struct cl_env *cl_env_fetch(void)
00747 {
00748         struct cl_env *cle;
00749 
00750         cle = current->LL_TASK_CL_ENV;
00751         if (cle && cle->ce_magic != &cl_env_init0)
00752                 cle = NULL;
00753         return cle;
00754 }
00755 
00756 static inline void cl_env_attach(struct cl_env *cle)
00757 {
00758         if (cle) {
00759                 LASSERT(cle->ce_owner == NULL);
00760                 cle->ce_owner = current;
00761                 cle->ce_prev = current->LL_TASK_CL_ENV;
00762                 current->LL_TASK_CL_ENV = cle;
00763         }
00764 }
00765 
00766 static inline void cl_env_do_detach(struct cl_env *cle)
00767 {
00768         LASSERT(cle->ce_owner == current);
00769         LASSERT(current->LL_TASK_CL_ENV == cle);
00770         current->LL_TASK_CL_ENV = cle->ce_prev;
00771         cle->ce_owner = NULL;
00772 }
00773 
00774 static int cl_env_store_init(void) { return 0; }
00775 static void cl_env_store_fini(void) { }
00776 
00777 #endif /* LL_TASK_CL_ENV */
00778 
00779 static inline struct cl_env *cl_env_detach(struct cl_env *cle)
00780 {
00781         if (cle == NULL)
00782                 cle = cl_env_fetch();
00783 
00784         if (cle && cle->ce_owner)
00785                 cl_env_do_detach(cle);
00786 
00787         return cle;
00788 }
00789 
00790 static struct lu_env *cl_env_new(__u32 ctx_tags, __u32 ses_tags, void *debug)
00791 {
00792         struct lu_env *env;
00793         struct cl_env *cle;
00794 
00795         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(cle, cl_env_kmem, GFP_NOFS);
00796         if (cle != NULL) {
00797                 int rc;
00798 
00799                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&cle->ce_linkage);
00800                 cle->ce_magic = &cl_env_init0;
00801                 env = &cle->ce_lu;
00802                 rc = lu_env_init(env, LCT_CL_THREAD|ctx_tags);
00803                 if (rc == 0) {
00804                         rc = lu_context_init(&cle->ce_ses,
00805                                              LCT_SESSION | ses_tags);
00806                         if (rc == 0) {
00807                                 lu_context_enter(&cle->ce_ses);
00808                                 env->le_ses = &cle->ce_ses;
00809                                 cl_env_init0(cle, debug);
00810                         } else
00811                                 lu_env_fini(env);
00812                 }
00813                 if (rc != 0) {
00814                         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(cle, cl_env_kmem);
00815                         env = ERR_PTR(rc);
00816                 } else {
00817                         CL_ENV_INC(create);
00818                         CL_ENV_INC(total);
00819                 }
00820         } else
00821                 env = ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
00822         return env;
00823 }
00824 
00825 static void cl_env_fini(struct cl_env *cle)
00826 {
00827         CL_ENV_DEC(total);
00828         lu_context_fini(&cle->ce_lu.le_ctx);
00829         lu_context_fini(&cle->ce_ses);
00830         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(cle, cl_env_kmem);
00831 }
00832 
00833 static struct lu_env *cl_env_obtain(void *debug)
00834 {
00835         struct cl_env *cle;
00836         struct lu_env *env;
00837 
00838         ENTRY;
00839         spin_lock(&cl_envs_guard);
00840         LASSERT(equi(cl_envs_cached_nr == 0, list_empty(&cl_envs)));
00841         if (cl_envs_cached_nr > 0) {
00842                 int rc;
00843 
00844                 cle = container_of(cl_envs.next, struct cl_env, ce_linkage);
00845                 list_del_init(&cle->ce_linkage);
00846                 cl_envs_cached_nr--;
00847                 spin_unlock(&cl_envs_guard);
00848 
00849                 env = &cle->ce_lu;
00850                 rc = lu_env_refill(env);
00851                 if (rc == 0) {
00852                         cl_env_init0(cle, debug);
00853                         lu_context_enter(&env->le_ctx);
00854                         lu_context_enter(&cle->ce_ses);
00855                 } else {
00856                         cl_env_fini(cle);
00857                         env = ERR_PTR(rc);
00858                 }
00859         } else {
00860                 spin_unlock(&cl_envs_guard);
00861                 env = cl_env_new(lu_context_tags_default,
00862                                  lu_session_tags_default, debug);
00863         }
00864         RETURN(env);
00865 }
00866 
00867 static inline struct cl_env *cl_env_container(struct lu_env *env)
00868 {
00869         return container_of(env, struct cl_env, ce_lu);
00870 }
00871 
00872 struct lu_env *cl_env_peek(__u16 *refcheck)
00873 {
00874         struct lu_env *env;
00875         struct cl_env *cle;
00876 
00877         CL_ENV_INC(lookup);
00878 
00879         /* check that we don't go far from untrusted pointer */
00880         CLASSERT(offsetof(struct cl_env, ce_magic) == 0);
00881 
00882         env = NULL;
00883         cle = cl_env_fetch();
00884         if (cle != NULL) {
00885                 CL_ENV_INC(hit);
00886                 env = &cle->ce_lu;
00887                 *refcheck = ++cle->ce_ref;
00888         }
00889         CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "%d@%p\n", cle ? cle->ce_ref : 0, cle);
00890         return env;
00891 }
00892 
00906 struct lu_env *cl_env_get(__u16 *refcheck)
00907 {
00908         struct lu_env *env;
00909 
00910         env = cl_env_peek(refcheck);
00911         if (env == NULL) {
00912                 env = cl_env_obtain(__builtin_return_address(0));
00913                 if (!IS_ERR(env)) {
00914                         struct cl_env *cle;
00915 
00916                         cle = cl_env_container(env);
00917                         cl_env_attach(cle);
00918                         *refcheck = cle->ce_ref;
00919                         CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "%d@%p\n", cle->ce_ref, cle);
00920                 }
00921         }
00922         return env;
00923 }
00924 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_env_get);
00925 
00931 struct lu_env *cl_env_alloc(__u16 *refcheck, __u32 tags)
00932 {
00933         struct lu_env *env;
00934 
00935         LASSERT(cl_env_peek(refcheck) == NULL);
00936         env = cl_env_new(tags, tags, __builtin_return_address(0));
00937         if (!IS_ERR(env)) {
00938                 struct cl_env *cle;
00939 
00940                 cle = cl_env_container(env);
00941                 *refcheck = cle->ce_ref;
00942                 CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "%d@%p\n", cle->ce_ref, cle);
00943         }
00944         return env;
00945 }
00946 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_env_alloc);
00947 
00948 static void cl_env_exit(struct cl_env *cle)
00949 {
00950         LASSERT(cle->ce_owner == NULL);
00951         lu_context_exit(&cle->ce_lu.le_ctx);
00952         lu_context_exit(&cle->ce_ses);
00953 }
00954 
00960 unsigned cl_env_cache_purge(unsigned nr)
00961 {
00962         struct cl_env *cle;
00963 
00964         ENTRY;
00965         spin_lock(&cl_envs_guard);
00966         for (; !list_empty(&cl_envs) && nr > 0; --nr) {
00967                 cle = container_of(cl_envs.next, struct cl_env, ce_linkage);
00968                 list_del_init(&cle->ce_linkage);
00969                 LASSERT(cl_envs_cached_nr > 0);
00970                 cl_envs_cached_nr--;
00971                 spin_unlock(&cl_envs_guard);
00972 
00973                 cl_env_fini(cle);
00974                 spin_lock(&cl_envs_guard);
00975         }
00976         LASSERT(equi(cl_envs_cached_nr == 0, list_empty(&cl_envs)));
00977         spin_unlock(&cl_envs_guard);
00978         RETURN(nr);
00979 }
00980 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_env_cache_purge);
00981 
00989 void cl_env_put(struct lu_env *env, __u16 *refcheck)
00990 {
00991         struct cl_env *cle;
00992 
00993         cle = cl_env_container(env);
00994 
00995         LASSERT(cle->ce_ref > 0);
00996         LASSERT(ergo(refcheck != NULL, cle->ce_ref == *refcheck));
00997 
00998         CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "%d@%p\n", cle->ce_ref, cle);
00999         if (--cle->ce_ref == 0) {
01000                 CL_ENV_DEC(busy);
01001                 cl_env_detach(cle);
01002                 cle->ce_debug = NULL;
01003                 cl_env_exit(cle);
01004                 /*
01005                  * Don't bother to take a lock here.
01006                  *
01007                  * Return environment to the cache only when it was allocated
01008                  * with the standard tags.
01009                  */
01010                 if (cl_envs_cached_nr < cl_envs_cached_max &&
01011                     (env->le_ctx.lc_tags & ~LCT_HAS_EXIT) == LCT_CL_THREAD &&
01012                     (env->le_ses->lc_tags & ~LCT_HAS_EXIT) == LCT_SESSION) {
01013                         spin_lock(&cl_envs_guard);
01014                         list_add(&cle->ce_linkage, &cl_envs);
01015                         cl_envs_cached_nr++;
01016                         spin_unlock(&cl_envs_guard);
01017                 } else
01018                         cl_env_fini(cle);
01019         }
01020 }
01021 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_env_put);
01022 
01028 void *cl_env_reenter(void)
01029 {
01030         return cl_env_detach(NULL);
01031 }
01032 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_env_reenter);
01033 
01037 void cl_env_reexit(void *cookie)
01038 {
01039         cl_env_detach(NULL);
01040         cl_env_attach(cookie);
01041 }
01042 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_env_reexit);
01043 
01051 void cl_env_implant(struct lu_env *env, __u16 *refcheck)
01052 {
01053         struct cl_env *cle = cl_env_container(env);
01054 
01055         LASSERT(cle->ce_ref > 0);
01056 
01057         cl_env_attach(cle);
01058         cl_env_get(refcheck);
01059         CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "%d@%p\n", cle->ce_ref, cle);
01060 }
01061 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_env_implant);
01062 
01066 void cl_env_unplant(struct lu_env *env, __u16 *refcheck)
01067 {
01068         struct cl_env *cle = cl_env_container(env);
01069 
01070         LASSERT(cle->ce_ref > 1);
01071 
01072         CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "%d@%p\n", cle->ce_ref, cle);
01073 
01074         cl_env_detach(cle);
01075         cl_env_put(env, refcheck);
01076 }
01077 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_env_unplant);
01078 
01079 struct lu_env *cl_env_nested_get(struct cl_env_nest *nest)
01080 {
01081         struct lu_env *env;
01082 
01083         nest->cen_cookie = NULL;
01084         env = cl_env_peek(&nest->cen_refcheck);
01085         if (env != NULL) {
01086                 if (!cl_io_is_going(env))
01087                         return env;
01088                 else {
01089                         cl_env_put(env, &nest->cen_refcheck);
01090                         nest->cen_cookie = cl_env_reenter();
01091                 }
01092         }
01093         env = cl_env_get(&nest->cen_refcheck);
01094         if (IS_ERR(env)) {
01095                 cl_env_reexit(nest->cen_cookie);
01096                 return env;
01097         }
01098 
01099         LASSERT(!cl_io_is_going(env));
01100         return env;
01101 }
01102 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_env_nested_get);
01103 
01104 void cl_env_nested_put(struct cl_env_nest *nest, struct lu_env *env)
01105 {
01106         cl_env_put(env, &nest->cen_refcheck);
01107         cl_env_reexit(nest->cen_cookie);
01108 }
01109 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_env_nested_put);
01110 
01116 void cl_attr2lvb(struct ost_lvb *lvb, const struct cl_attr *attr)
01117 {
01118         ENTRY;
01119         lvb->lvb_size   = attr->cat_size;
01120         lvb->lvb_mtime  = attr->cat_mtime;
01121         lvb->lvb_atime  = attr->cat_atime;
01122         lvb->lvb_ctime  = attr->cat_ctime;
01123         lvb->lvb_blocks = attr->cat_blocks;
01124         EXIT;
01125 }
01126 
01132 void cl_lvb2attr(struct cl_attr *attr, const struct ost_lvb *lvb)
01133 {
01134         ENTRY;
01135         attr->cat_size   = lvb->lvb_size;
01136         attr->cat_mtime  = lvb->lvb_mtime;
01137         attr->cat_atime  = lvb->lvb_atime;
01138         attr->cat_ctime  = lvb->lvb_ctime;
01139         attr->cat_blocks = lvb->lvb_blocks;
01140         EXIT;
01141 }
01142 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_lvb2attr);
01143 
01144 static struct cl_env cl_env_percpu[NR_CPUS];
01145 
01146 static int cl_env_percpu_init(void)
01147 {
01148         struct cl_env *cle;
01149         int tags = LCT_REMEMBER | LCT_NOREF;
01150         int i, j;
01151         int rc = 0;
01152 
01153         for_each_possible_cpu(i) {
01154                 struct lu_env *env;
01155 
01156                 cle = &cl_env_percpu[i];
01157                 env = &cle->ce_lu;
01158 
01159                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&cle->ce_linkage);
01160                 cle->ce_magic = &cl_env_init0;
01161                 rc = lu_env_init(env, LCT_CL_THREAD | tags);
01162                 if (rc == 0) {
01163                         rc = lu_context_init(&cle->ce_ses, LCT_SESSION | tags);
01164                         if (rc == 0) {
01165                                 lu_context_enter(&cle->ce_ses);
01166                                 env->le_ses = &cle->ce_ses;
01167                         } else {
01168                                 lu_env_fini(env);
01169                         }
01170                 }
01171                 if (rc != 0)
01172                         break;
01173         }
01174         if (rc != 0) {
01175                 /* Indices 0 to i (excluding i) were correctly initialized,
01176                  * thus we must uninitialize up to i, the rest are undefined. */
01177                 for (j = 0; j < i; j++) {
01178                         cle = &cl_env_percpu[i];
01179                         lu_context_exit(&cle->ce_ses);
01180                         lu_context_fini(&cle->ce_ses);
01181                         lu_env_fini(&cle->ce_lu);
01182                 }
01183         }
01184 
01185         return rc;
01186 }
01187 
01188 static void cl_env_percpu_fini(void)
01189 {
01190         int i;
01191 
01192         for_each_possible_cpu(i) {
01193                 struct cl_env *cle = &cl_env_percpu[i];
01194 
01195                 lu_context_exit(&cle->ce_ses);
01196                 lu_context_fini(&cle->ce_ses);
01197                 lu_env_fini(&cle->ce_lu);
01198         }
01199 }
01200 
01201 static void cl_env_percpu_refill(void)
01202 {
01203         int i;
01204 
01205         for_each_possible_cpu(i)
01206                 lu_env_refill(&cl_env_percpu[i].ce_lu);
01207 }
01208 
01209 void cl_env_percpu_put(struct lu_env *env)
01210 {
01211         struct cl_env *cle;
01212         int cpu;
01213 
01214         cpu = smp_processor_id();
01215         cle = cl_env_container(env);
01216         LASSERT(cle == &cl_env_percpu[cpu]);
01217 
01218         cle->ce_ref--;
01219         LASSERT(cle->ce_ref == 0);
01220 
01221         CL_ENV_DEC(busy);
01222         cl_env_detach(cle);
01223         cle->ce_debug = NULL;
01224 
01225         put_cpu();
01226 }
01227 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_env_percpu_put);
01228 
01229 struct lu_env *cl_env_percpu_get()
01230 {
01231         struct cl_env *cle;
01232 
01233         cle = &cl_env_percpu[get_cpu()];
01234         cl_env_init0(cle, __builtin_return_address(0));
01235 
01236         cl_env_attach(cle);
01237         return &cle->ce_lu;
01238 }
01239 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_env_percpu_get);
01240 
01241 /*****************************************************************************
01242  *
01243  * Temporary prototype thing: mirror obd-devices into cl devices.
01244  *
01245  */
01246 
01247 struct cl_device *cl_type_setup(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_site *site,
01248                                 struct lu_device_type *ldt,
01249                                 struct lu_device *next)
01250 {
01251         const char       *typename;
01252         struct lu_device *d;
01253 
01254         LASSERT(ldt != NULL);
01255 
01256         typename = ldt->ldt_name;
01257         d = ldt->ldt_ops->ldto_device_alloc(env, ldt, NULL);
01258         if (!IS_ERR(d)) {
01259                 int rc;
01260 
01261                 if (site != NULL)
01262                         d->ld_site = site;
01263                 rc = ldt->ldt_ops->ldto_device_init(env, d, typename, next);
01264                 if (rc == 0) {
01265                         lu_device_get(d);
01266                         lu_ref_add(&d->ld_reference,
01267                                    "lu-stack", &lu_site_init);
01268                 } else {
01269                         ldt->ldt_ops->ldto_device_free(env, d);
01270                         CERROR("can't init device '%s', %d\n", typename, rc);
01271                         d = ERR_PTR(rc);
01272                 }
01273         } else
01274                 CERROR("Cannot allocate device: '%s'\n", typename);
01275         return lu2cl_dev(d);
01276 }
01277 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_type_setup);
01278 
01282 void cl_stack_fini(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_device *cl)
01283 {
01284         lu_stack_fini(env, cl2lu_dev(cl));
01285 }
01286 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cl_stack_fini);
01287 
01288 static struct lu_context_key cl_key;
01289 
01290 struct cl_thread_info *cl_env_info(const struct lu_env *env)
01291 {
01292         return lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &cl_key);
01293 }
01294 
01295 /* defines cl0_key_{init,fini}() */
01296 LU_KEY_INIT_FINI(cl0, struct cl_thread_info);
01297 
01298 static void *cl_key_init(const struct lu_context *ctx,
01299                          struct lu_context_key *key)
01300 {
01301         struct cl_thread_info *info;
01302 
01303         info = cl0_key_init(ctx, key);
01304         if (!IS_ERR(info)) {
01305                 size_t i;
01306 
01307                 for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(info->clt_counters); ++i)
01308                         lu_ref_init(&info->clt_counters[i].ctc_locks_locked);
01309         }
01310         return info;
01311 }
01312 
01313 static void cl_key_fini(const struct lu_context *ctx,
01314                         struct lu_context_key *key, void *data)
01315 {
01316         struct cl_thread_info *info;
01317         size_t i;
01318 
01319         info = data;
01320         for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(info->clt_counters); ++i)
01321                 lu_ref_fini(&info->clt_counters[i].ctc_locks_locked);
01322         cl0_key_fini(ctx, key, data);
01323 }
01324 
01325 static void cl_key_exit(const struct lu_context *ctx,
01326                         struct lu_context_key *key, void *data)
01327 {
01328         struct cl_thread_info *info = data;
01329         size_t i;
01330 
01331         for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(info->clt_counters); ++i) {
01332                 LASSERT(info->clt_counters[i].ctc_nr_held == 0);
01333                 LASSERT(info->clt_counters[i].ctc_nr_used == 0);
01334                 LASSERT(info->clt_counters[i].ctc_nr_locks_acquired == 0);
01335                 LASSERT(info->clt_counters[i].ctc_nr_locks_locked == 0);
01336                 lu_ref_fini(&info->clt_counters[i].ctc_locks_locked);
01337                 lu_ref_init(&info->clt_counters[i].ctc_locks_locked);
01338         }
01339 }
01340 
01341 static struct lu_context_key cl_key = {
01342         .lct_tags = LCT_CL_THREAD,
01343         .lct_init = cl_key_init,
01344         .lct_fini = cl_key_fini,
01345         .lct_exit = cl_key_exit
01346 };
01347 
01348 static struct lu_kmem_descr cl_object_caches[] = {
01349         {
01350                 .ckd_cache = &cl_env_kmem,
01351                 .ckd_name  = "cl_env_kmem",
01352                 .ckd_size  = sizeof (struct cl_env)
01353         },
01354         {
01355                 .ckd_cache = NULL
01356         }
01357 };
01358 
01365 int cl_global_init(void)
01366 {
01367         int result;
01368 
01369         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&cl_envs);
01370 
01371         result = cl_env_store_init();
01372         if (result)
01373                 return result;
01374 
01375         result = lu_kmem_init(cl_object_caches);
01376         if (result)
01377                 goto out_store;
01378 
01379         LU_CONTEXT_KEY_INIT(&cl_key);
01380         result = lu_context_key_register(&cl_key);
01381         if (result)
01382                 goto out_kmem;
01383 
01384         result = cl_env_percpu_init();
01385         if (result)
01386                 /* no cl_env_percpu_fini on error */
01387                 goto out_context;
01388 
01389         return 0;
01390 
01391 out_context:
01392         lu_context_key_degister(&cl_key);
01393 out_kmem:
01394         lu_kmem_fini(cl_object_caches);
01395 out_store:
01396         cl_env_store_fini();
01397         return result;
01398 }
01399 
01403 void cl_global_fini(void)
01404 {
01405         cl_env_percpu_fini();
01406         lu_context_key_degister(&cl_key);
01407         lu_kmem_fini(cl_object_caches);
01408         cl_env_store_fini();
01409 }
